      • getMapSize

        public int getMapSize()

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int location)
        Returns the cell at the specified location. The are numbered as such:
        0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
        +- - - - - - - -+
        |. . . . . . . .|0
        |. . . . . . . .|1
        |. . . . . . . .|2
        |. . . . . . . .|3
        |. . . . . . . .|4
        |. . . . . . . .|5
        +- - - - - - - -+

        And the location of a specific cell is given by the product of it's row and column. Moving backwards from a specified cell, a row is given by the location / columns and the column is given by location % columns.

        Parameters:
        location - The cell's location within the map
        Returns:
        The cell at the given location

      • getMapArray

        public Cell[][] getMapArray()

      • buildRoom

        public void buildRoom(int topLeftX,
             int topLeftY,
             int bottomRightX,
             int bottomRightY,
             Terrain roomType)
        Fills the tiles between specified points with room tiles.

        Example: If it where called as such buildRoom( 2, 2, 4, 4, Terrain.KITCHEN) on the map below where the period character (".") represents valid tiles:

        +---------------------+
        |.....................|
        |.....................|
        |.....................|
        |.....................|
        |.....................|
        |.....................|
        +---------------------+

        Would become:

        +---------------------+
        |.....................|
        |.....................|
        |..KKK................|
        |..KKK................|
        |..KKK................|
        |.....................|
        +---------------------+
        Parameters:
        topLeftX - The x-coordinate of the top left point of the room
        topLeftY - The y-coordinate of the top left point of the room
        bottomRightX - The x-coordinate of the bottom right point of the room
        bottomRightY - The y-coordinate of the bottom right point of the room
        roomType - The terrain to fill the given area with
